meta_description.title: PaRappa the Rapper - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: PaRappa the Rapper is a rhythm game in which the main character, PaRappa, must make his way through each of the game's six stages by rapping. As the teacher ...Genre(s): RhythmMode(s): Single-playerArtist(s): Rodney GreenblatWriter(s): Gabin Itou‎PaRappa the Rapper 2 · ‎Um Jammer Lammy · ‎NanaOn-Sha · ‎Masaya Matsuura

people_also_ask.heading: The SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Parappa joined the Rapper's Union as a new recruit, although he only repeats what the heroes say. ... Parappa died in Episode 9 when Barkley threw a powerful basketball that landed in his chest.

people_also_ask.question: Is the PaRappa anime canon?
people_also_ask.heading: PaRappa the Rapper doesn't exactly have a canon to adhere to. The first game is all about PaRappa learning life lessons, such as driving a car, exercising, fiscal responsibility, cooking, and waiting in line at public bathrooms. The sequel has a weird sci-fi plot about a machine that turns everything into noodles.24-Apr-2019

people_also_ask.question: What does PaRappa mean in Japanese?
people_also_ask.heading: flat
people_also_ask.heading2: Parappa, in fact, means ''flat'' or ''paper thin'' in Japanese.12-Mar-1998
